actions.text: Amendment SA 3833 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 394.

Amendment SA 3833 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Cotton to Amendment SA 3830. (consideration: CR S6804-6805, S6808; text: CR S6804-6805) To modify the immigration benefits for which certain Afghan nationals are eligible.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3833 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Cotton to Amendment SA 3830.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3833 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 394.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3833 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 394.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To modify the immigration benefits for which certain Afghan nationals are eligible.
